channel.title: Help
channel.description: I am redoing my whole server, and I need to know how to change where the home teleport takes you. Please don't tell me to go into client.java and change the code's x and y teles, I would if there was a command for it. Is there anyway I can change it in Player.java if there is could someone help me. Also I am trying to change the colors of some of the items, but I know I need a client and an Item dump > I have a client it is just the dump part is there any1 I can get one. Could I make a notepad file and just through some codes in there, and then place it in my server file. PLease help thank you.

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

If you’re using Deltascape, the teleports are located in the clickingMost class, although the teleports are random so you won’t find them by their coordinates, but by their action button id’s.

Read full topic
